original_title: Girls' Generation 4th Tour - Phantasia in Japan
overview: The fourth concert tour headlined by South Korean girl group Girls' Generation, in support of their fifth studio album Lion Heart (2015). The tour was officially announced in October 2015, began on November 21, 2015, and concluded on May 8, 2016, consisting of 13 shows.
title: Girls' Generation 4th Tour - Phantasia in Japan
